directions: Mix flour and Greek yogurt together in a bowl; transfer to a work surface floured with self-rising flour. Knead dough, adding more flour as needed to keep dough from being too sticky, for 8 to 10 minutes.
Spray a 12-inch pizza pan with cooking spray and spread dough to edges of pan.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups self-rising flour, plus more for kneading
title: Two-Ingredient Pizza Dough
